About Te Kete Ako

"Whaowhia te kete mÄtauranga"

Fill the basket of knowledge

ğŸŒŸ Our Mission

Te Kete Ako exists to support kaiako (teachers) in Aotearoa New Zealand with culturally responsive, high-quality educational resources that honor Te Ao MÄori while meeting modern pedagogical standards. We believe every student deserves access to engaging, culturally authentic learning experiences that connect them to their identity and prepare them for the future.

ğŸ›ï¸ Our Vision

To create an educational ecosystem where Te Ao MÄori is naturally integrated into all learning, where technology enhances rather than replaces human connection, and where every kaiako has access to resources that inspire, engage, and empower their students to achieve their potential.

ğŸŒ¿ Our Values

ğŸ¤ WhakatÅhea (Partnership)

Collaborative relationships with educators, communities, and cultural advisors

ğŸŒº Manaakitanga (Care)

Supporting every learner with aroha and respect for their unique journey

âš–ï¸ Tika (Integrity)

Authentic, accurate, and ethically developed educational content

ğŸš€ Auaha (Innovation)

Embracing technology and creative approaches to enhance learning
